DeepCover v0.1.16
activesupport/lib/active_support/cache/strategy/local_cache.rb
1# frozen_string_literal: true
2
3require "active_support/core_ext/object/duplicable"
4require "active_support/core_ext/string/inflections"
5require "active_support/per_thread_registry"
6
7module ActiveSupport
8 module Cache
9 module Strategy
10 # Caches that implement LocalCache will be backed by an in-memory cache for the
11 # duration of a block. Repeated calls to the cache for the same key will hit the
12 # in-memory cache for faster access.
13 module LocalCache
14 autoload :Middleware, "active_support/cache/strategy/local_cache_middleware"
15
16 # Class for storing and registering the local caches.
17 class LocalCacheRegistry # :nodoc:
18 extend ActiveSupport::PerThreadRegistry
19
20 def initialize
21 @registry = {}
22 end
23
24 def cache_for(local_cache_key)
25 @registry[local_cache_key]
26 end
27
28 def set_cache_for(local_cache_key, value)
29 @registry[local_cache_key] = value
30 end
31
32 def self.set_cache_for(l, v); instance.set_cache_for l, v; end
33 def self.cache_for(l); instance.cache_for l; end
34 end
35
36 # Simple memory backed cache. This cache is not thread safe and is intended only
37 # for serving as a temporary memory cache for a single thread.
38 class LocalStore < Store
39 def initialize
40 super
41 @data = {}
42 end
43
44 # Don't allow synchronizing since it isn't thread safe.
45 def synchronize # :nodoc:
46 yield
47 end
48
49 def clear(options = nil)
50 @data.clear
51 end
52
53 def read_entry(key, options)
54 @data[key]
55 end
56
57 def write_entry(key, value, options)
58 @data[key] = value
59 true
60 end
61
62 def delete_entry(key, options)
63 !!@data.delete(key)
64 end
65
66 def fetch_entry(key, options = nil) # :nodoc:
67 @data.fetch(key) { @data[key] = yield }
68 end
69 end
70
71 # Use a local cache for the duration of block.
72 def with_local_cache
73 use_temporary_local_cache(LocalStore.new) { yield }
74 end
75
76 # Middleware class can be inserted as a Rack handler to be local cache for the
77 # duration of request.
78 def middleware
79 @middleware ||= Middleware.new(
80 "ActiveSupport::Cache::Strategy::LocalCache",
81 local_cache_key)
82 end
83
84 def clear(options = nil) # :nodoc:
85 return super unless cache = local_cache
86 cache.clear(options)
87 super
88 end
89
90 def cleanup(options = nil) # :nodoc:
91 return super unless cache = local_cache
92 cache.clear
93 super
94 end
95
96 def increment(name, amount = 1, options = nil) # :nodoc:
97 return super unless local_cache
98 value = bypass_local_cache { super }
99 write_cache_value(name, value, options)
100 value
101 end
102
103 def decrement(name, amount = 1, options = nil) # :nodoc:
104 return super unless local_cache
105 value = bypass_local_cache { super }
106 write_cache_value(name, value, options)
107 value
108 end
109
110 private
111 def read_entry(key, options)
112 if cache = local_cache
113 cache.fetch_entry(key) { super }
114 else
115 super
116 end
117 end
118
119 def write_entry(key, entry, options)
120 if options[:unless_exist]
121 local_cache.delete_entry(key, options) if local_cache
122 else
123 local_cache.write_entry(key, entry, options) if local_cache
124 end
125
126 super
127 end
128
129 def delete_entry(key, options)
130 local_cache.delete_entry(key, options) if local_cache
131 super
132 end
133
134 def write_cache_value(name, value, options)
135 name = normalize_key(name, options)
136 cache = local_cache
137 cache.mute do
138 if value
139 cache.write(name, value, options)
140 else
141 cache.delete(name, options)
142 end
143 end
144 end
145
146 def local_cache_key
147 @local_cache_key ||= "#{self.class.name.underscore}_local_cache_#{object_id}".gsub(/[\/-]/, "_").to_sym
148 end
149
150 def local_cache
151 LocalCacheRegistry.cache_for(local_cache_key)
152 end
153
154 def bypass_local_cache
155 use_temporary_local_cache(nil) { yield }
156 end
157
158 def use_temporary_local_cache(temporary_cache)
159 save_cache = LocalCacheRegistry.cache_for(local_cache_key)
160 begin
161 LocalCacheRegistry.set_cache_for(local_cache_key, temporary_cache)
162 yield
163 ensure
164 LocalCacheRegistry.set_cache_for(local_cache_key, save_cache)
165 end
166 end
167 end
168 end
169 end
170end
